snippet: The United States, the I.M.F. and the Egyptian government must work together to revive the country’s economy.
abstract: Editorial urges the United States, the International Monetary Fund and the Egyptian government to work together to revive Egypt's economy; contends that it is hard to overstate the importance of helping put Egypt on a firm economic footing, and there is no reason Congress should not support the Obama administration in providing aid to the country.
lead_paragraph: The United States, the I.M.F. and the Egyptian government must work together to revive the country’s economy.
